EN_NAME_LENGTH: English name must be between 2 and 100 characters long
AR_NAME_LENGTH: Arabic name must be between 2 and 100 characters long
ACTIVE_IS_BOOLEAN: Active status must be a boolean
IMAGE_IS_STRING: Image URL must be a string.
IMAGE_IS_URL: Image URL must be a valid URL.
DELETED_AT_IS_DATE: Deleted at must be a valid date.
